name: Job Hop
tag_list: sales-jobsu-k, recruitment, jobs, work, employers, employment, retail-jobs-u-k, medical-jobs-u-k
overview:
They say It’s who you know and this Networking site helps you to connect with Employers & Recruiters. You also get to network with well connected Hoppers who may know of positions within their organisations that you would be suitable for.

Here’s a site where you get to tell the world what you really want to do. So you wanted to be a marine biologist or to work in Tv but things didn’t work out that way. This site allows you to revive your dream.

Job Hop allows ( The Hopper) to make a profile, build a c.v, blog about ones expertise, & display any skills.

If you’re looking for a job or to change a job this site makes a useful tool.

Free to use for Hoppers & Employers/Recruiters
